post.body: yay!! I can't promise the same kind of folks as the NYprime crew (christ).. lol.. been to all those parties before.
you better be ok for our bonnie & clyde adventure in 3 weeks
my gift to my family this year is my glowing presence as well as that of a friend who has a great ass.. ur welcome guys..
I have no clue how to use twitter or why I need to..
pulled my ass muscle trying not to hit a tree on a sled. still love the snow tho..
watching Caddyshack in my sisters movie theater, neices delivering me coffee and cake... trying to twitter more
thank god this house is big enough for 16 of us.. snow, chocolate patron, fire roaring!
Every problem facing the US today can be attributed to 4 consecutive generations of pot smoking...
I'm cleaning my camera gear. That's right a good old film camera.. Digital still can't compare when it comes to nature photography..
gets treated completely differently in a simple wardrobe upgrade. attention ghetto thugs.. striped polo shirts are gay..
if Sarah Palin can play Tina Fey playing Sarah Palin on SNL tonight, that will be impressive. TIVO it.
why cant dogs warn you before they fart? why the silent assault? No leg lift, no hip lean.. damnit.
when did "going to the prom" become "going to prom"? It's an event not an institution! that really grinds my gears..
at the dog park.. its in the 70s and breezy.. amazing evening..
I'm praying that the writer of the $5 footlong Subway jingle gets hit by a car. Does that make me religious?
My friend vanessa is so fun she broke my freakin' funometer!
trying to get my dog to piss in the rain.. C'mon!!
hoping my friend VS is doing good :-)
chiming in after neglecting twitter for weeks. Listening to miles davis and reading Nat Geo
Ike is going to peter out before it hits us.. No cat 4. Upper level winds will pull it apart. May hit us as a TS. It peaked too soon!
